name: Language and Computers
description: This course is designed to introduce students with some background in linguistics (but little background in Computing Sciences) to the two general aims of computational linguistics: to enable computers to analyze and process natural language (the technological aim) and to model human language on computers (the linguistic aim). Students will be introduced to the tools and resources (and their limitations) used by computational linguists and how they are applied in the latest research. [12L, 24P]
